title: Texas Man Eaten Alive by Unleashed Dogs Dies Waiting for Transplant
summary:
GoFundMeA Texas man who lost both his legs after being mauled by a trio of unleashed dogs earlier this month has died, authorities say.
Nicolas Vasquez, who lived in the Houston suburb Huffman, died of organ failure after 10 days in the hospital waiting for a liver transplant, according to a GoFundMe.
Family and community members are now pushing the Harris County Sheriff’s Office to arrest the dogs’ owners.
When he went to investigate, Vasquez was lying in a ditch with three “pitbull mixes” attacking him until Stoy intervened.
He lost a lot of blood.”First responders took Vasquez to a hospital, and the dogs were seized by animal control.
